p: Three of the biofacies are more widely distributed (Fig. 5B, C). Biofacies M1 occurs in the J2 siliciclastic system and was also found in one open shallow subtidal sample from the J1a. The diverse biofacies M3 occurs frequently in the open shallow subtidal samples of J1a and J2, and more rarely in the ooid shoal of J3. Dominated by the small oyster Liostrea strigilecula, biofacies M4 is present mostly in the open shallow subtidal zone of J1a and J2, but also in the open shallow subtidal environment of J2a, the peritidal of J2 and J3, and the ooid shoal of J3.
